name: Gastly
author: Keiji Kinebuchi
flavor_text: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

attacks.name: Sleeping Gas
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Destiny Bond
attacks.effect: Discard 1 {P} Energy card attached to Gastly in order to use this attack. If a Pokémon Knocks Out Gastly during your opponent’s next turn, Knock Out that Pokémon.
